activities.name: 01a Transform Country Attibutes
activities.description: Placeholder for missing mailing and billing country

activities.name: Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from NO_Building__c 
where Postcode__c = '@{item().Postcode}'
and State__c = '@{item().State}'
and Suburb__c = '@{item().Suburb}'
and Street_Number__c = '@{item().StreetNumber}'
and Street_Name__c = '@{item().StreetName}'
and Name = '@{item().PremiseName}'

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce').Output.value[0].Id

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce').output.value

activities.name: Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce

dependsOn.activity: Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID

query.value:
Select id from Contact
where Email= '@{activity('Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID').output.value[0].Email}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce').output.value
@activity('Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce').output.value[0].Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Company by ABN In Salesforce

dependsOn.activity: Get Company Details by Company Id

query.value:
Select id from Account
where NO_ABN__c = '@{activity('Get Company Details by Company Id').output.value[0].ABN}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Company by ABN In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Company by ABN In Salesforce').output.value
@activity('Lookup Each Company by ABN In Salesforce').output.value[0].Id

activities.name: Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select Top 1 * from AssessorsStage where AssessorId = '@{item().AssessorId}'

activities.name: Get Company Details by Company Id

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select Top 1 * from CompanyStage where CompanyId = @{item().CompanyId}

activities.name: If Officer Id is not null or empty

value.value: No Tech Officer found for this Rating header. Ignoring

ifTrueActivities.name: Get Tech Officer Details by Officer Id
Lookup Each Tech Officer by Email In Salesforce

dependsOn.activity: Get Tech Officer Details by Officer Id

query.value:
Select id from User
where Email like '%@{activity('Get Tech Officer Details by Officer Id').output.value[0].Email}%'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Tech Officer by Email In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Tech Officer by Email In Salesforce').output.value[0].Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from Contact
where NO_Id_In_Member__c = @{item().member_assessor_id}

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce').output.value[0].Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from NO_Building__c 
where Postcode__c = '@{item().Postcode}'
and State__c = '@{item().State}'
and Suburb__c = '@{item().Suburb}'
and Street_Number__c = '@{item().StreetNumber}'
and Street_Name__c = '@{item().StreetName}'
and Name = '@{item().Name}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce').output.value[0].Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from Account
where NO_ABN__c = '@{item().ABN}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce').output.value[0].Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Rating by Member Rating Id In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from NO_Rating__c 
where NO_Member_Rating_Id__c = @{item().RatingHeaderID}

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Rating by Member Rating Id In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Rating by Member Rating Id In Salesforce').output.value

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_company_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_company_id as integer,
		Mailing_Country as string,
		Billing_Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getCompany
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as string,
		member_company_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getAssessor
getAssessor, getCompany join(getAssessor@member_company_id == getCompany@member_company_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(getAssessor@salesforce_company_id))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as string,
		member_company_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		salesforce_company_id = getCompany@salesforce_company_Id,
		id = getAssessor@id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	pbatch_id as integer (1)
}
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_company_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_company_id as integer,
		Mailing_Country as string,
		Billing_Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Mailing_Country)||isNull(Billing_Country))) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow2 derive(DefaultMailingCountry = "Australia",
		DefaultBillingCountry = "Australia",
		id = id) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_company_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_company_id as integer,
		Mailing_Country as string,
		Billing_Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Mailing_Country = DefaultMailingCountry,
		Billing_Country = DefaultBillingCountry,
		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	pbatch_id as integer (1)
}
source(output(
		RatingHeaderID as integer,
		RatingReferenceNumber as string,
		PremiseTypeID as integer,
		PremiseType as string,
		PremiseID as integer,
		PremiseName as string,
		AssessorID as integer,
		AssessorEmail as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Customer_TradingName as string,
		Customer_Mailing_StreeNumber as string,
		Customer_Mailing_StreetName as string,
		Customer_Mailing_Suburb as string,
		Customer_Mailing_Postcode as string,
		Customer_Mailing_State as string,
		RatingPeriodFrom as timestamp,
		RatingPeriodTo as timestamp,
		PublicListingFlag as boolean,
		OfficerID as integer,
		RatingStatusID as integer,
		RatingStatus as string,
		LodgedDate as timestamp,
		PaymentStatusID as integer,
		PaymentStatus as string,
		PaidDate as timestamp,
		CertificateValidFrom as timestamp,
		CertificateValidTo as timestamp,
		PremiseNameOnCert as string,
		CustomerNameOnCert as string,
		Certificate_Customer_Email as string,
		ReplaceFlag as boolean,
		RenewFlag as boolean,
		PreviousRatingHeaderID as integer,
		NewRatingHeaderID as integer,
		StreetNumber as string,
		StreetName as string,
		Suburb as string,
		Postcode as string,
		State as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		RatingTypes as string,
		RatingMainPurpose as string,
		HasCinema as boolean,
		LastActionDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getRatings
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_building_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_premise_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupSalesforceBuildings
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as string,
		member_company_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupSalesforceAssessors
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_user_Id as string,
		member_officer_id as integer,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupSalesforceTechOfficer
getRatings filter(equals(batch_id, $pbatch_id)) ~> filterBatchRatings
joinLookupSalesforceAssessors, filterSFBuildingByBatch join(PremiseID == member_premise_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinLookupSalesforceBuilding
getLookupSalesforceBuildings filter(equals(batch_id,  $pbatch_id)) ~> filterSFBuildingByBatch
derivedFields, filterSFAssessorsByBatch join(AssessorID == member_assessor_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinLookupSalesforceAssessors
getLookupSalesforceAssessors filter(equals(batch_id,  $pbatch_id)) ~> filterSFAssessorsByBatch
filterBatchRatings derive(D_Rating_Scope = iif(equalsIgnoreCase(PremiseType, 'shopping centre'), 'Not applicable', ''),
		D_Main_Purpose_Of_Rating = iif(equalsIgnoreCase(PremiseName, 'shopping centre'), 'None of the above (NABERS voluntary rating)', ''),
		D_Renew_Replace = iif(!isNull(RenewFlag) || !isNull(ReplaceFlag), 
iif(RenewFlag, 'Renew', iif(ReplaceFlag, 'Replace', '')),'')) ~> derivedFields
getLookupSalesforceTechOfficer filter(equals(batch_id, $pbatch_id)) ~> filterSFOfficerByBatch
joinLookupSalesforceBuilding, filterSFOfficerByBatch join(OfficerID == member_officer_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinLookupSalesforceUsers
joinLookupSalesforceUsers sink(input(
		id as integer,
		source_rating_id as integer,
		building_type as string,
		sf_company_id as string,
		sf_building_id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		sf_rating_id as string,
		sf_assessor_id as string,
		assessor_email as string,
		customer_email as string,
		cert_building_name as string,
		cert_customer_name as string,
		rating_type as string,
		rating_main_purpose as string,
		has_cinema as boolean,
		period_from as timestamp,
		period_to as timestamp,
		status as string,
		cert_valid_from as timestamp,
		cert_valid_to as timestamp,
		rating_ref_number as string,
		lodged_date as timestamp,
		rating_scope as string,
		publicly_listed as boolean,
		sf_officer_id as string,
		last_update_date as timestamp,
		renew_replace as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		source_rating_id = RatingHeaderID,
		building_type = PremiseType,
		sf_building_id = salesforce_building_Id,
		batch_id = getRatings@batch_id,
		sf_assessor_id = salesforce_assessor_Id,
		assessor_email = AssessorEmail,
		customer_email = Certificate_Customer_Email,
		cert_building_name = PremiseNameOnCert,
		cert_customer_name = CustomerNameOnCert,
		status = RatingStatus,
		period_from = RatingPeriodFrom,
		period_to = RatingPeriodTo,
		cert_valid_from = CertificateValidFrom,
		cert_valid_to = CertificateValidTo,
		has_cinema = HasCinema,
		rating_type = RatingTypes,
		rating_main_purpose = D_Main_Purpose_Of_Rating,
		rating_ref_number = RatingReferenceNumber,
		lodged_date = LodgedDate,
		rating_scope = D_Rating_Scope,
		publicly_listed = PublicListingFlag,
		sf_officer_id = salesforce_user_Id,
		sf_company_id = salesforce_company_id,
		last_update_date = LastActionDate,
		renew_replace = D_Renew_Replace
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dumpToSFTransofrmedRatings
